title: AI Chat Log
description: Schema for logging an interaction with the AI chat.

kullanici_id.description: The unique identifier for the user.

mesaj.description: The message sent by the user.

niyet.description: The intent extracted from the user's message (e.g., 'find_part', 'check_compatibility').

varliklar.description: Entities extracted from the message (e.g., vehicle model, part name).

zaman_damgasi.description: The timestamp of the log entry.

examples.mesaj: 2022 model BMW 3 serisi için fren balatası var mı?
